components module¶

Distributed stream system architecture simulation classes.

The purpose of these classes is to collect detailed statistics that are independent of the particular algorithm, and report them in a standardized (and therefore auto-processable) manner.

class components.Channel(src, dst)¶

Bases: object

Point-to-point or broadcast unidirectional channel.

Channels are used to collect network statistics. Each channel counts the number of messages and the total message size (in bytes).

Parameters

  • src (host) – the one that sends the msg

  • dst (host) – the one that receives the msg

  • msg (int) – number of msgs sent by this channel

  • bytes (int) – bytes sent by this channel

send(msgtype: msg_types.MsgType, msg)¶

src calls this proxy method in order to sent a msg :type msgtype: MsgType :param msgtype: constant custom types of msgs :param msg: the msg to sent :return: None

class components.Host(nid)¶

Bases: object

Hosts are used as nodes in the network.

add_handler(msgtype, handler_func)¶

add in the handlers list a user_given function to implement on the host

Parameters

  • msgtype – type of msg

  • handler_func – the given function

Returns

None

connect(peer, recv_channel, send_channel)¶

creates a connection between the caller and its peer

Parameters

  • peer – host to connect with

  • recv_channel – channel to receive msgs from peer

  • send_channel – channel to send msgs from peer

Returns

None

receive(channel, msgtype, msg)¶

a method to receive a msg from the channel it is called by the ‘channel.send()’ proxy method

Parameters

  • channel – channel to receive the msg from

  • msgtype – type of the msg

  • msg – the msg to be received

Returns

None

send(peer, msgtype, msg)¶

remote method that calls the ‘channel.send’ proxy method to send a msg

Parameters

  • peer – host to send msg

  • msgtype – type of the msg

  • msg – the msg to be sent

Returns

None

class components.StarNetwork(k, node_type=<class 'components.Host'>, coord_type=<class 'components.Host'>, channel_type=<class 'components.Channel'>)¶

Bases: object

A star network contains nodes, a coordinator and their connections.

Parameters

k (int) – the number of nodes in the network

link(node, coord)¶

creates bidirectional connection between a node and the coordinator

Parameters

  • node – the node to connect with the coordinator

  • coord – the coordinator of the network

Returns

None
